Posts.Title: Migraine and Fec

Posts.Content: Thanks Lynn, I have some different migraine tablets from my GP to try next time, so fingers crossed! But will get some codeine with neurofen to try as well. Ann x
Posts.Title: Migraine and Fec

Posts.Content: Hi I've just had my second Fec treatment and both times I have had an almost instant migraine, I've tried taking my migraine tablets while having the treatment but didn't make any difference, I just wondered if anyone else has suffered this, or any tips on this?Â  Many Thanks Ann x
